message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. That's a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to go down to $8000 for the product?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $8500. This is my final offer.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $9000. I'm willing to make a slight concession and offer the product to you for $8800. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product!
